divs: Sighting DetailsStepped out back door of home to have a smoke. A few stars were visible among the clouds and then I saw 3 white orbs dancing around one another. In relation to visible stars, they were about the same in size. they darted around and at one point two of them apparently merged and that combo got a little bigger. Then they separated. Watched the 3 of them for about eight minutes. No camera available for pix, but doubt they would appear as other than those streaky lights you see on the ufo tv shows anyway. Finished my cigarette and went back in house.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Everett
There were no other sightings in Everett on or around October 26th 2011
